import React, { Component } from "react"; import { render } from "react-dom"; import tokenLogo from "../token-logo.png"; import ethLogo from "../eth-logo.png"; class Main extends Component { render() { return (
Balance: {window.web3.utils.fromWei(this.props.ethBalance, "Ether")}
    ETH
Balance:{" "} {window.web3.utils.fromWei(this.props.tokenBalance, "Ether")}
    PEP
Exchange Rate 1 ETH = 100 PEP
); } } export default Main;
